sentence.Network_en: She did her best to appear more self-assured than she felt.
sentence.Network_cn: 她竭力让自己表现得比实际更自信。
他是一个胸有成竹、充满信心的谈判者。

sentence.Network_en: His manner was self-assured and brusque.

list.abs: ...和决定的意识形成流动状态，使自我发展出非自我意识的自我信心（unselfconscious self assurance）。
Your pronounced strength of will projects your self - assurance to others ., 你意志的力度对别人展现了你的自我保证.
Despite the self - assurance of Iraqi leaders , many political issues remain ., 尽管伊拉克领袖们满怀信心 , 可是许多政治问题依然存在.
Successful traders are self - assured but never arrogant ., 成功的交易者自我安慰 , 但不傲慢.
the self-assured may appear to be doing better than they are and will have fewer about a pay rise .自信的人可能看起来做的要比实际好，而且在要求加薪方面也没有那么多的顾虑。

entry.def: Someone who is self-assured shows confidence in what they say and do because they are sure of their own abilities.

example.tran: 他是一个胸有成竹、充满信心的谈判者。

means.word_mean: 1. showing poise and confidence in your own worth;

sentences.sentence: "hardly more than a boy but firm-knit and self-confident"
